Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2010 11:11AM fritzellen wrote: Totally agree with the other posters... you will lose your hair on FAC. Mine fell out betwen the 2nd and 3rd treatment. I had it buzzed pretty short after my first Tx and then I just noticed a gradual thinning to the point of baldness. Not quite as shoking as waking up one morning with a huge clump of hair on yourÂ  pillow!! Sounds like you're prepared with your wigs, the champagne and a friend for support! Go for it. Ellen
